name: Mahjong Cupcake Bakery
description:
Kathy and Ann are back with their new Cupcake Bakery store. Enjoy a set of many beautiful Mahjong boards with wonderful designed tiles and join them on their trip. Will you help them to bake all the delicious cakes and unlock new baking recipes? Let's go!

Features:
- Play wonderful handpicked Mahjong boards.
- Large growing game map to explore.
- New boards and worlds will be added regularly.
- Play all the levels and unlock new Cupcake recipes.
- Find baking ingredients and collect special Cupcakes.
- Use different Power-Ups while you play.
- Play the Daily Tasks to collect a bonus.
- Collect bonus coins on the Daily Bonus Challenge.
- Spin the Bonus Wheel to collect Power-Ups and more.
- Open and unlock new Bonus Chests to get useful Power-Ups.
- Simple controls and relaxing game play.
- Game Center with Achievements and Leaderboards
- iCloud support syncs your game between all your iOS devices
- iPad Pro display support
- iMessage Stickers
- Relaxing music and sound effects.

We hope you will enjoy Mahjong Cupcake Bakery. If you have a moment, please help spread the word by leaving a review on the App Store and telling your friends! Thank you! :-)

Join us on Facebook
http://facebook.com/MahjongCupcakeBakery
